name: Naruto Shippuden Ultimate Storm Generations
description: The game is so awesome that i had to make a terrible video to balance things out. lol.  NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: ULTIMATE M.U.G.E.N STORM GENERATIONS Ver.4.01 THE GAME IS MADE ON M.U.G.E.N 1.1 ENGINE. Being M.U.G.E.N 1.1, the game REQUIRES OpenGL and quite some bit of RAM. Best recreation of the original Storm Generation in the M.U.G.E.N 1.1 engine EVER! It's finally time to publish! After a long time absent, i thought i would give the finishing touches to the game everyone was waiting for!
